Smart Sock: A sock that tracks your foot movements and provides real-time feedback to help you improve your footwork.
Sock with Built-in Air Purifier: A sock that cleanses the air around your feet and keeps them smelling fresh all day.
Sock with Embedded Solar Panels: A sock that harnesses the power of the sun to charge your phone or other devices on the go.
Sock with Adaptive Cushioning: A sock that adjusts to the shape of your foot and provides customized cushioning for maximum comfort.
Sock with Augmented Reality: A sock that displays information such as weather updates, notifications, and fitness data directly on your foot.
